description:
Specially optimised for TouchPad with stunning visuals and a pumping sound track make this ground-breaking game the way perfect way to show off what your TouchPad can do!

Nominated for a Best App Ever Award on iPhone and was featured multiple times on the App Store under both New and Noteworthy and What's Hot, this is fast-paced, arcade style ekranoplan racing action at it's very best. 

Boasting incredible 3D graphic detail and procedural landscapes never before seen in any game of its type, the game will appeal to lovers of fast-paced, competitive action genres as well as those who prefer something more sedate and relaxing. 

14 challenging levels await you with big jumps, steep drops and twisting paths to master all playable in Stereoscopic 3D if you have 3D glasses. Hunt down your opponents one by one in an attempt to take a medal and unlock the next track or challenge your previous best time in a head to head ghost race. 

Choose to follow one of the pre-prescribed routes and accumulate boosts by successfully steering through check points, or simply ignore the markers/towers and guidance and choose to explore the road less travelled. Whichever you choose, you're guaranteed a beautiful journey!

Features:

* 14 challenging levels
* 10 different Ground Effect craft
* Stunning terrains (land & sea)
* Free roaming – explore at will
* Sensitive and intuitive flight controls 
* Throttle speed controller
* High score recording
* Replay & ghost-race modes
* Boost control
* Day and night scenarios 
* Driver/1st person camera view
* Free-play practice levels
* Super smooth animation up to 60FPS

Please note optional Stereoscopic 3D mode requires 3D glasses of red/cyan, yellow/blue or green/magenta (best) variety. You don't need 3D glasses to play.

Please email us with questions or feedback.
